Translations.Text: Amdan, s tidep, ipwaxleq d aeemmaq
Ma innul it cceoo, atan di leqlala
Ma innul it lxio, ad isqucee
Kkes ed imeulla
imezgiyen di teilla nnsen
i ippaken seg ayla nnsen, leeqq ipwassnen
i umappar, akked ume$bun
wid ipputebbten s wass iqeiiiyen
wid iugaden aaaqeb n Mass nnsen
War ccekk, aaaqeb n Mass nnsen ur illi segs usellek
Wid ieurben af tuzzuft nnsen
kkes ed ar tilawin nnsen, ne$ piklatin nnsen; akka, ur ppulummun
Wid ib$an sennig waya, widak d tilas ay zegren
Wid ippaiiafen deg wawal nnsen, di tgallit nnsen
wid ippaiiafen di ccada nnsen
wid ipearaben $ef teilla nnsen
Widak, di leonanat, d imaazuzen
Acu iu$en ijehliyen, uzlen d $uoek, imegrav qquoen
Yeffus, zelmev, d igrawen
Yal amdan, segsen, issarem ad ikcem Loennet n ssaad
Xaii! S tidep, Nxelq iten seg wayen eEoan
Ihi, ggulle$ s Mass igmav akked ituram, ar Nekwni d Wid izemren
a d Nawi ay ten yifen, deg umkan nnsen! Ur aÂ£ izeggwir yiwen
Eoo iten ad slullven, ad uraren, ar d magren ass nnsen, win i sen ippuwaaaden
ass ideg ara d ff$en si tneilin, ppazzalen, amzun ar id$a$en sbedden
Ad brun i wallen, ddell fellasen. D wagi ay d ass i sen ippuwaaaden
S tidep, Nuzen ed Nue i ugdud is: "endeo agdud ik, uqbel a ten id ias uaaqeb aqeoean
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Nek, i kunwi, d aneddao ipbegginen
Aabdet Oebbi, teezzbem aS, tessemeessem iyi
Ad Isemmee seg ibekkaven nnwen, ad awen Ifk lmudda ar lajel ipwassnen. S tidep, lajel n Oebbi, ma iusa d, ur ipwexxio, lemmer peeoim
Inna: "a Mass iw! Nek, ssawale$ i ugdud iw, am yiv am ass
Siwa tugin i sen terna ti$oi w
Nek, yal tikelt ara ten neccde$ iwakken a sen Tsemmeev, ad rren ivudan nnsen deg imeeeu$en nnsen, ad pplen deg iceiiiven nnsen. Ggernennen, zuxxen s tem$weo
Sinna, ssawle$ asen s uaaggev
Sinna, ainani nni$ asen; s tuffra, sser, mli$ assen
Nni$: "ssutret ssmae i Mass nnwen; Neppa ard Win Ipsemmieen
Ippazen awen d ageffur, seg igenni, d ihedman
Ayla akked tarwa, Issuget awen; Ifka yawen timizar; Irra yawen isaffen
Acu kwen iu$en, Oebbi, ur aS tgim ccan
Ni$ i waya, Ixelq ikwen
Ur twalam ara amek Ixleq Oebbi ua igenwan d idurra
Irra degsen, aggur d tafat. Irra iiij d asavef
Oebbi Issem$i kwen seg wakal, am im$an
Sinna, a kwen Irr $uoes; sinna, d tuff$a ara kwen id Issuffe
Oebbi Irra yawen tamurt d tuwsiat
iwakken, degs, a ppafem iberdan d tiza
Inna Nue: "a Mass iw! Atnan auuan iyi. Ddan akked win iwumi, ayla s akked tarwa s, ay s rnan, siwa lexsaoa
Sxedmen tieila meqqwoen
Nnan: "ur ppaooat ioebbiten nnwen! Ur ppaooat Wadd, Suwaa, Ya$ut, Yaauq, akked Nauo
Ni$ aias ay telfen. Ur Trennuv i imednas, siwa ttelfan
Ilmend n tuccva nnsen, $evuen, sinna kecmen ar tmes. War Oebbi, ur ppafen imaiwnen nnsen
Inna Nue: "a Mass iw! Ur Ppaooa, seg ijehliyen, amezda$ di tmurt
Aql aK id ma Teooiv ten, ad telfen imdanen iK. Siwa tijehli akked laao, ara d arwen
A Mass iw, Semmee a$, nek akked imawlan iw, akked win id ikecmen s axxam iw, iumen, akked wid d tid iumnen. Ur Rennu i imednas, siwa aquccu
